org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat
Class SecureRealm

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat.SecureRealm
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.catalina.Realm
public class SecureRealm
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.catalina.Realm

A Realm extension for Tomcat 4.0 that will use org.cougaar.core.security.crypto.ldap.KeyRingJNDIRealm if it exists and the System property org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat.enableAuth is "true".

The server.xml should have within the <Engine> section: 

   <Realm className="org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat.SecureRealm" />
